segments.text: Hello sir , how may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to buy some flowers , please . Something really nice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , may I ask what the occasion is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s not really an occasion , it ’ s more like I ’ m sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well.This arrangement here is very popular among regretful husbands and boyfriends . It has a dozen long stem red roses with a couple of sunflowers and a single orchid that stands out . It includes a small teddy bear to achieve the effect of immediate forgiveness .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I ’ m gonna need more than just a dozen red roses and a bear . What else do you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mmm , well this is our “ I ’ m sorry I cheated on you ” package . Two dozen red roses lined with tulips , carnations and lilies . The fragrance and beauty of this flower arrangement is sure to make her forgive you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t think that ’ s gonna cut it . I need something bigger and better !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry sir but , what exactly did you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I may have accidentally insinuated that she is getting chubbier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Get out of my store , you jerk !
